reuters.title: COCA-COLA ENTERPRISES <CCE> UNIT HEAD QUITS
reuters.body: Coca-Cola Enterprises Inc said Don Ulrich will be resigning as president of its Northeast Group to pursue other business interests. The company said Jim Stevens, who is also a Coca-Cola Enterprises vice president and president of its Mid-Atlantic Coca-Cola Bottling Co affiliate, will succeed Ulrich. Reuter 
